All Classes

Class Description
AudioManager
Class that manages and plays audio files
Card
An object representing a gaming card with a color and a value
CardEffect
Functional interface which determines the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card.
CardEffectChaos
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card, has to be accordant with the chaos gamemode
CardEffectClassic
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card, has to be accordant with the classic gamemode
Color
Enumeration which defines a set of 5 colors
Deck
a class that defines a deck to play the UNO card game
EndgameController
Controller that handles the Loss and Victory views both
Entity
A class that represents a generic player that could be human or artificial
Game
a class that represents a game and its features
GameController
Controller that handles the GameView view
GameOverConditions
Functional interface which determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game
GameOverConditionsClassic
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game, has to be accordant with the classic gamemode
GameOverConditionsTeam
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if and who won the game, has to be accordant with the team gamemode
IncorrectPasswordException
Exception used to warn the player that they have inserted the wrong password for the account
JUno  
LoginOrRegisterController
Controller that handles the LoginOrRegister view
LoginState  
MainMenuController
Controller that handles the MainMenu view
Player
Class that represents an human player and their account
PreGameSettingsController
Controller that handles the PreGameSettings view that is used to change the gamemode and start the game
RegistrazioneController
Controller that handles the Registrazione view
SaveNotFoundException
Exception used to warn the player that the asked account was not found in the saves directory savedProfiles
SettingsController
Controller that handles the Settings view
StatisticsController
Controller that handles the Statistics view
UserSettingsController
Controller that handles the UserSettings view
ValidPlay
Functional interface which determines the behavior of Game when it has to check if the human player has played according to the rules
ValidPlayChaos
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if the human player has played according to the rules, has to be accordant with the chaos gamemode
ValidPlayClassic
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to check if the human player has played according to the rules, has to be accordant with the classic gamemode
Value
Enumeration which defines a set of 14 values, each with a corresponding int number
